p: Maximum annual carbon in standing dead grass ( Fig 3) was highest in the Central Valley portion of the study area in the land use change scenarios (ModDynFSLU and ModDynNFLU), and this was greater under CNRM than under MIROC. It was also somewhat higher in the western portion of the study in the with-fire scenarios, with larger areal extent under MIROC but higher values with CNRM.
